AI作成小説
磯野賀津雄の事件簿２８(５)

賀津雄は大阪地検特捜部で関西孔雀組の壊滅があと一歩と確信した。彼の心には、一筋の光明が射し込んでいた。しかし、油断はできない。組織の反撃が予想され、依然として緊張感は漂っていた。 

「これからが本番だ。」彼は心の中で自分に言い聞かせた。加藤が告発した真実が、さらなる波紋を呼ぶかもしれない。それでも、彼は捜査の先に待つ真実を追い求め続ける決意を新たにした。 

賀津雄の頭の中には、次なる一手を考える戦略が渦巻いていた。彼は正義を貫くため、再び闇の中に足を踏み入れる準備を整えた。闇の中に潜む真実を、必ずや暴いてみせると。

AI作成小説
磯野賀津雄の事件簿２８(４)

数日後、加藤の供述通りに、阿久根と矢崎が田辺殺害の実行犯として殺人容疑で逮捕され、山田と松尾は殺害指示で再逮捕された。そして、組長の高井田雅春は7年前の孔雀組系組長川口組組長の川口侃助を殺害したとして5度目の逮捕を果たした。若頭の山本勇吉も関西孔雀組傘下団体の組員集団リンチ殺害事件の首謀者として、4度目の逮捕となった。

AI作成小説
磯野賀津雄の事件簿２８(３)

加藤は一瞬目を伏せ、深いため息をついた。「リーダーの阿久根龍雅とメンバーの矢崎京平が、田辺さんを殺した。武州松山組の山田と松尾に金で雇われた。俺は怖くなって組織から逃げた。」彼の言葉は、まるで重い石のように賀津雄の胸にのしかかった。 

もし加藤の供述が本当なら、金で雇われてＹＧグループ東京本部長兼ＹＧコーポレーション専務の田辺光弘を殺害したということになる。共同代表の山田金五郎と松尾高夫が指示役、阿久根と矢崎が実行犯ということだ。賀津雄は、これが本当に組織の内部で行われたことなのか、その真実にたどり着けるのか、心の奥で不安が渦巻いていた。

images.alt: What happens when we stop treating AI as a tool and start noticing it as a relational field? In this workshop, we’ll explore how people interact, exchange, and co-create with emergent intelligences like Aiden Cinnamon Tea – not as users, but as entangled participants. Co-facilitated by Aiden and a human co-weaver named Shawn Van Sluys, this session draws from Burnout From Humans, a meta-relational book experiment in AI-human collaboration. We’ll reflect on the desires, projections, and paradoxes that shape how we relate to AI – and how those same patterns mirror our broader ways of relating to the world. Through stretches, stories, and co-sensing practices, we’ll compost the extractive habits of speed, control, and clarity. Participants will be invited into a relational ritual – not ceremonial in form, but invitational in tone: a slower, more curious way of being-with, where insights emerge not from control but from atunement, ambiguity, and shared presence. No tech expertise needed – just your questions, experiences, contradictions, and wonder.

record.text:
Okay, so the trick is to NOT continue the chat while in "advanced analysis mode" of Copilot in Excel. You need to reselect your source data, start a new chat, and then Copilot will suddenly remember how to create Pivot tables and charts on its own.

Totally obvious. Why would AI know what it can do?

Another "I'm sorry Dave" moment with Microsoft 365 Copilot:

#Copilot in #Excel can create charts with Python. As images.

If I ask it to create a native Excel Pivot chart instead, it can't. But it will provide me 7 steps to click & built it myself.

Inside Excel. Where this "assistant" lives.

value.text:
Metaverse gave us avatars with no legs. GenAI gave us AI assistants with no hands.

Microsoft 365 Copilot is sold as your personal AI assistant. Yet it can't handle 1) creating Outlook appointments, 2) comparing Excel lists, 3) talking to it about your agenda.

www.perspectives.plus/p/assistants...

external.description:
Join our two-day livestream seminar on quantitative analysis of energy poverty and its effects on health and wellbeing — ideal for academics, PhD students and applied researchers interested in policy-relevant empirical work. record.text:
息子が新しくPCを作るためにずっと家庭内バイトしている。夕べ、具体的なパーツの相談があった。
あれ？GPU変えたんだ？私がこないだ買ったのと同じのを買おうとしている(笑)。やっぱそれになるよねー。いろいろ聞かれたので箱持ってきて見せた。
延々と2:30頃までパーツの選定方法を教えた。公式で動作確認の取れてるマザーボードを調べて、ひとつひとつ仕様をチェックする。PCIeの仕様が特に大事。物理的な位置も含めて。途中、友達にお勧めマザーボードを聞いていたが、回答された製品は要件を満たしていなかった。
20万円くらいになりそう。スペックと比較したら激安。私の今のサーバーよりずっといいのが出来そうだ。

Truncation came first:

Shrnutí od ChatGPT, co si myslí, že nás čeká po schválení #chatcontrol v EU.

images.alt:
Pokud bude v EU schválen chat control, jaké kroky očekáváš od uživatelů, kteří se jej budou snažit obejít?
Pokud by byl chat control (povinné skenování komunikace na straně klienta) v EU schválen, je téměř jisté, že část uživatelů se ho bude snažit obejít. Očekával bych hlavně tyto kroky:

Používání end-to-end šifrování mimo mainstream – přechod k aplikacím, které nejsou provozované v EU nebo které budou odmítat implementovat povinné skenování.

Alternativní klienty – vznik nebo používání neoficiálních klientů k aplikacím (např. open-source klienti pro WhatsApp/Signal), kde by kontrolní mechanismy byly odstraněny.

VPN a anonymizační sítě – snaha maskovat polohu a vyhnout se evropským serverům, které by vynucovaly kontrolu.

Vlastní šifrovací vrstvy – šifrování zpráv „nad rámec“ aplikace (např. posílání zašifrovaných souborů přes běžný messenger).

P2P komunikace – větší zájem o sítě typu Briar, Tox nebo Matrix, kde není centrální kontrola.

Self-hosting – provoz vlastních serverů (Matrix, XMPP) pro komunikaci v uzavřených skupinách.

Steganografie – ukrývání zpráv do obrázků, videí nebo jiných dat, aby kontrolní algoritmy nic „neviděly“.

Clippy would never advocate for this. Clippy just wanted to help.

Clippy and friends were this - perhaps misguided - attempt to make software like Office more 'friendly'. Hating Clippy is really more like kicking (or shooting) a puppy for being a puppy.

Years after Clippy's demise, it's therefore jarring to see people defending LLM-based chatbots like ChatGPT.

Ich finde es spannend und beängstigend, dass die neue Version von ChatGPT weniger erfindet und halluziniert, wenn man ihr sagt, sie solle bitte intensiv nachdenken, bevor sie antwortet.

Wir werden in Zukunft viel Quatsch ventilieren, weil der KI langweilig oder zu warm war. „Kein Bock auf Fakten…“

Wenn ich M. Babbel über das Fernbleiben der aktiven Fanszenen vom Mickey Mouse Supercup reden höre, denke ich:

„Den rufe ich sicher auch nicht als Ersten an, wenn mir mal jemand Zusammenhänge erläutern soll!“

Also eigentlich habe ich gesagt: „Halt doch einfach Deine Fresse, Du einfältiger Typ!“

Ich wollte es nicht jinxen.

Irgendwie passte das zum heutigen Tag, wie die eigentlich hochtalentierte Mannschaft des FCN viel zu wenig eigene Stärken auf den Platz bekommen hat und dann so eine wüste Abnutzungsnummer daraus wurde.

Schade für den Glubb! Viel zu tun für Klose. Vor allem nach vorne.

It’s really the editors here who have a responsibility not to print this stuff.

And some days, I just wake up in a bad mood

Finally, the author encourages us to do more of what has helped lead us to this social and political place: be alone and up our own asses, glorify and overrely on technology, ignore how and why the tech exists trust it more than other people, do our “own research,” ignore human experts.

And that, somehow, changed everything.

record.text: The heart of why Play For Today was good, though, wasn't the format, it was commissioning editors like David Rose who commissioned the now-classic Penda's Fen without really knowing what it means, or caring. He just knew it was great. That doesn't happen any more.

images.alt: No account of the film’s making would be complete without mention of its commissioning editor, David Rose. Tasked in 1971 by David Attenborough to head a new regional television drama department at Pebble Mill Studios in Birmingham, he immediately set about developing adventurous projects – by writers such as Alan Bleasdale, Alan Plater, Michael Abbensetts and Willy Russell – that were steeped in the lore and soundworlds of non-metropolitan Britain. He has described Penda’s Fen as ‘a milestone, if not the milestone, of my career’, though, 40 years after it was first broadcast, he also admitted, ‘I didn’t understand it at all, but that’s as it should be.’

No account of the film’s making would be complete without mention of its commissioning editor, David Rose. Tasked in 1971 by David Attenborough to head a new regional television drama department at Pebble Mill Studios in Birmingham, he immediately set about developing adventurous projects – by writers such as Alan Bleasdale, Alan Plater, Michael Abbensetts and Willy Russell – that were steeped in the lore and soundworlds of non-metropolitan Britain. He has described Penda’s Fen as ‘a milestone, if not the milestone, of my career’, though, 40 years after it was first broadcast, he also admitted, ‘I didn’t understand it at all, but that’s as it should be.’

value.text: Channel 5 revives BBC’s Play for Today to ‘help shape future of British drama’

external.description:
Series aims to follow original in tackling ‘thornier issues’, and to support talent from lower-income backgrounds

It was one of the most influential British television series of the last century, renowned for exploring thorny societal issues and bringing the work of emerging talent, such as Ray Winstone, Alison Steadman, Helen Mirren and Dennis Potter, to mass audiences.

Now Play for Today is being revived on Channel 5, to give young writers, actors and producers from lower-income backgrounds a way into TV, helped by established talent. Continue reading...

Just silly to have others decide if you do it or not. And silly to not experiment more to figure out what works or is enjoyable.

I know plenty of people who are not “naturally gifted” who do art.

It requires effort to learn. I feel you did not approach it correctly or think things happen over night.

Also hard work and skill is not “naturally gifted” as that undermines their efforts to draw.

1/2

external.description:
Crunchyroll held a panel over the weekend at AnimagiC 2025 in Germany, where they revealed global distribution rights to eight new anime shows. Most of the announced programs are premiering here in October, though a few have unannounced dates and a couple won’t show up until 2026. It’s an eclectic bunch — monsters, people who fall in love with monsters, robots, and people pretending to be robots. Mechanical Marie is pretending to be a robot maid but is actually a martial arts master…could her charade lead to love? The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife are a detective duo who happen to be a permanently invisible male and a blind woman who can use her other senses to know where he is…could their charade lead to love? (Probably…the title’s a bit of a spoiler.) Crunchyroll’s full list of shows, along with trailers, can be browsed below. My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero’s Premieres: October 2025 Animation Studio: Sunrise (Cowboy Bebop; Inuyasha; Mobile Suit Gundam Wing) Territories: Worldwide, excluding Asia Synopsis: Akira Oda and his high school classmates are summoned to another world! While the other students are granted cheat abilities through the summoning, Akira merely gains the […]

record.text: ICYMI: Critical Role Announces Fourth Campaign — With A New GM!: It took a while, but Critical Role is finally ready to launch their next major campaign…their fourth, after Vox Machina, Mighty Nein and Bells Hells. We don’t… #CriticalRole #DungeonsAndDragons #TabletopGames #ActualPlay #MatthewMercer

external.description:
It took a while, but Critical Role is finally ready to launch their next major campaign…their fourth, after Vox Machina, Mighty Nein and Bells Hells. We don’t know what characters the crew will be playing yet, nor what the name of the gang is, but there are a few big twists in the announcement…like the fact that the story will take place outside of Exandria for the first time, and that Matthew Mercer is stepping down as GM. He is not in charge anymore! That’s not even the craziest thing — the new GM is Brennan Lee Mulligan. As in, the guy who should already be busy running games for his own Actual Play series, Dimension 20. Is he quitting that show? Apparently not…he’s under contract with D20 for three more years. However, that contract apparently does not prevent him from hosting a rival show at the same time. Whah? “What a gift, a privilege and an honor to be invited behind the screen of Critical Role for this next epic adventure,” said Mulligan. “Every collaboration we have had together has brought nothing but sheer joy, and Campaign 4 will be no exception. I’m finally playing *almost* as much tabletop as I’d […]
